diff_act: 1.implement the stride-scheduling algorithm to determine the order and priority of jobs execution
3.maintain fairness and efficiency as per the stride-scheduling algorithm rules.

regen.absent_element: maintenance of fairness and efficiency during job execution
regen.new_specification: The scheduler shall ensure fairness and efficiency during job execution in accordance with the stride-scheduling algorithm rules.

regen.absent_element: stop condition when no jobs left
regen.new_specification: The scheduler shall trigger a stop condition when there are no remaining jobs in the queues.

regen.absent_element: ensuring fairness and efficiency in job scheduling as per stride-scheduling algorithm
regen.new_specification: The scheduler shall ensure fairness and efficiency in job scheduling, as per the stride-scheduling algorithm.

label: In case of a tie, the arbitrary FIFO job ordering is used.
absence: situation of multiple minimum pass values(tie)
